abstract: Research grants from NASA used to developed lightweight composites are cited in the World Trade Organization’s report.
snippet: Research grants from NASA used to developed lightweight composites are cited in the World Trade Organization’s report.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Boeing received at least $5.3 billion in improper subsidies from the United States government to develop its 787 Dreamliner and other jet models, giving it an unfair advantage against its European rival, Airbus, the World Trade Organization confirmed in a report published Thursday.

headline.main: W.T.O. Rules U.S. Subsidies for Boeing Unfair
headline.print_headline: W.T.O. Rules U.S. Subsidies for Boeing Unfair
